name: Evacuate (TheShaggyDev)
description:
Help a robovac build itself up until it's tough enough to escape the lab! Created for Godot Wild Jam 53.

Default controls (rebindable in-game):

  • WASD or arrow keeys to move
  • 1 to use rocket
  • 2 to use laser
  • R to restart level
  • P to pause

A few notes:

The laser only works on internal walls.

There's a known bug where attempting to fire the laser too rapidly can result in using an energy cell without the laser actually firing again. To get around this, just let the laser finish firing before trying to use it again.

Also, unfortunately, due to some last-minute PC issues, afraid I wasn't able to finish all the levels and there's a graphical glitch or two that made it into release, but nothing game breaking.
